name: The Essentials
description:
It’s the first day of uni, and you just want everything you really need to be in just one box. Fear not – the essentials box is just what you need! And this box isn’t even just for the first day of uni – it’s for whenever the essentials need topping up too! It even includes a super handy USB LED light to help with all that midnight reading students are famous for…

Save a student from forgetting the essentials! Order your essentials pack today, or send one to a needy or disorganised friend. Introductory price of just £12.99. Days on end without showering isn’t going to make you lots of new friends…

The Essentials pack contains:

-	1 x Shower gel
-	1 x Deodrant
-	1 x Plug in USB LED light
-	1 x Stationary pack
-	1 x Nescafe coffee sachet
-	1 x Kleenex tissues
-	2 x cookie cream biscuits
-	1 x pack of paracetamol
-	1 x Tic-Tacs
-	1 x Chewing gum
-	1 x Bottle of Evian water
-	1 x Toothbrush & toothpaste combo
-	1 x Throat sweets
-	1 x pack Haribo
-	1 x school bar
-	1 x lolly

*Please note, products such a lolly pops and sweet packets may vary slightly*

name: Party Pack
description:
It’s the end of the week, and it’s time to party. In fact, it’s any day of the week and it’s time to party! Our party pack contains all you need for a great night in/out! Need face paint for themed party? Check. Glow sticks? Check. Shot glasses? Check.  Test tube shot glasses?! Check. Personal flashing LED fish bowl? Check. Red Bull for mixer? Check. Some sweets for the walk back home? Check. 


Save a student from boredom!  Order your party package today, or send one to a desperate friend in need of escaping the mounting workload!  Introductory price of just £12.99. Just add alcohol. 

Party Pack contains:

-	Flashing LED bowl
-	8 x plastic shot glasses
-	2 x test tube shot glasses
-	1 x tube of glow sticks
-       1 x 'Shot in a tube' (Alcohol content 15%)
-	1 x can Red Bull
-	1 x pack of Haribo
-       1 x Mask
-	1 x lolly

*Please note, products such a lolly pops and sweet packets may vary slightly*

name: Student Food Pack
description:
The weather outside is rubbish, you’re too tired from last night’s student union dance off but you kind of need to eat. Equally, you may be a parent fearing that your beloved son or daughter has magically substituted food for vodka. The student food package has all the typical student eats, enough for at least a day or so of food! Plus, the carbohydrates will be really good to eat just before another crazy night out: the box even includes at least 2 of your 5 a day! Pretty balanced if we do say so ourselves…

Save a student from the hassle of shopping! Order your student food pack today, or send one to a student you fear may not be eating! Introductory price of just £12.99. You can’t be a student without some form of noodles in your life…

The Student Food pack contains:
-	1 x Heinz Baked Beans
-	1 x Pack of noodles
-	1 x School bar
-	1 x Dolmio pasta pot with sauce
-	1 x Nescafe coffee sachet
-	1 x Squares crisps
-	1 x Heinz Oxtail or Tomato soup
-	1 x Bottle of Evian water
-       1 x Fruit & Yogurt-coated fruit pack
-	1 x cookie cream biscuits
-       1 x Pack of raisins
-       1 x Golden syrup porridge sachet
-       1 x Flapjack bar
-	2 x Haribo packs
-	2 x lollies

*Please note, products such a lolly pops and sweet packets may vary slightly*

name: The Hangover Pack
description:
Ok, you used the party pack with your favourite alcoholic beverages and now you’re paying the price. Fear not, the hangover pack is here to help! It’s got all you need to nurse your sorry self back to full health. Everything from a warm hot water bottle to cuddle in bed, to the caffeine culprits which will get you through tomorrow’s 9am lecture.

Save a student from the hangover from hell! Order your hangover pack today, or send one to a friend suffering (or who will suffer!) at the evil hands of alcohol. Introductory price of just £12.99. Until the next night out…

Hangover Pack contains:

-	1.5L Hot water bottle
-	1 x portable coffee cup
-	1 x Nescafe coffee sachet
-	1 x pack Pro Plus
-	1 x Kleenex tissues
-	1 x Heinz Tomato soup
-	1 x bottle of Evian water
-	1 x cough sweets
-	1 x can Red Bull
-	1 x pack of paracetamol
-	1 x pack Haribo
-	1 x lolly
-       6 x 80mg Vitamin C tablets

*Please note, products such as lolly pops and sweet packets may vary slightly*
